AIProviderSettingDescription: Connect your own AI service to unlock advanced features in {{productName}}. Once added, it will be accessible to all users in AI chats.
ConnectProductToYourDataAndTools: Connect {{productName}} to your data and tools.
DeleteProviderDescription:
Deleting this provider will revoke access for all users, and its settings will be permanently erased.
 To use the provider again, you will need to set it up from scratch.
DeleteServerDescription:
Deleting this server will revoke access for all users, and its settings will be permanently erased.
 To use the server again, you will need to set it up from scratch.
DisableServerDescription:
If you block this server, it will no longer be available to users, but its settings will remain intact. 
Unblocking it later may require users to reauthorize, depending on the provider's requirements.
MCPSettingDescription: The {{organizationName}} {{productName}} MCP Server streamlines AI-driven workflows, integrating LLMs with external systems for efficient and secure document management.
MCPServerDescriptionHint: Write a brief explanation of the integration's purpose
MCPServerIntegrationURLHint: Enter the MCP server address provided by your service
ProviderNameInputHint: Use any name that is convenient for you to identify this connection
ProviderURLInputHint: Enter the API endpoint URL provided by your AI service
ProviderKeyInputHint: Enter the API key generated from your AI provider's dashboard
ResetProviderKeyDescription: The API key is displayed only once upon saving and is then hidden for security purposes. If it is reset, a new key must be provided; otherwise, AI features, including the chat, will be unavailable.
SearchDescription: Connect a web search engine to enhance AI chats with real-time information from the internet. Once configured, it will be available to all users in {{productName}}.
ToUseAddProvider: To use {{value}}, make sure to connect at least one provider first.
WebSearchKeyHiddenDescription: The API key is displayed only once upon saving and is then hidden for security purposes.
KnowledgeSettingsDescription: Enable a knowledge base for AI agents. The system will index your documents using the {{modelName}} model to support question-based search through your data. This feature focuses on finding relevant information but doesn't generate summaries or perform global analysis.
